config.error.browser_not_supported.title: Browser not supported
config.error.browser_not_supported.messa: Your are using a web browser which does not support our technology. Please, update to a more modern web browser.
config.error.vars.title: Error in system configuration
config.error.vars.message: There is an error in the system configuration and it cannot be accessed. Contact the administrator
string.label: Label
string.valid_user_description:
For security reasons, users must fulfill the following conditions:

- Only one special char (._-) allowed and it must not be at the extremes of the string
- The first character cannot be a number
- All the other characters allowed are letters and numbers
- The total length should be between 3 and 20 chars

Example: niceBoy.cuban
